body: Theodore and Chris, I added Move, Mirror and Rotate for Honeybee objects. You can find them under WIP. Let me know your thoughts. Keep in mind that all boundary condition will be set to Outdoors once you move, copy or mirror a zone and you need to recalculate adjacency. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/OxyEFcGSM-Mh*bnJ9QuCeHOxz5JsXwTMaqYIcdryZWglo7IOdOLfN3UL9fYFQqVTaF7BJE0jHFszKJDPZjaj8xgtFPv9objk/Transform_Honeybee.png) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/OxyEFcGSM-PEu38pAL93GrfOHsKzlofTd0xXFlDMpec6SnfOJB33wzGU8Mar8w6cDfRhnwPz*WRUb2ZCGKTYr*-MpYnmOJFJ/Honeybee_transforms.JPG)
